name: Random Civilization Survival Game
description:
This is the game I have done with a friend of mine for the Beginner Gam Jam# 4

Control
Only mouse and left click

Summary
The television presenteur "MicOctopus" introduce us a new episode of the game show named "Random Civilization Survival Game".
This show is only about annihilate random civilization accros the universe, and for this episode they choose our poor Earth.
In order to defend the planet, you have been choosen to do some trials. The more trials you won, the more points you score. But at the end, we can't win this game show :(

Tips to complete minigames

  • Destroy the rockets : click on the rocket to destroy them
  • Heals civilians : drag n drop pills to heal the people (don't drag 2 pills to the same dude, he 'll took it !)
  • Dodge the bulet : drag the mouse to move the human space ship

More

The game jam theme was "Game Show".
 You can't stop music background, if it's that annoying, i suggest you to mute the web page.

I planned to make more minigames but I lost enthusiam and stopped at 3 minigames :s Hope you'll enjoy it :) Comment your best score maybe ? :p
